item.title: Intro to Blogging
item.description: What Blogging. There are many popular software engineering blogs that give programmers an outlet to discuss and share what they are working on. This is mine Why It will help me document the projects that I’m working on in a slightly better way than git commit messages like “Fix this thing”. How The why this site is published involves a few moving parts, organized into 2 github repositories. cjmakes-blog The source lives here in the form of a hugo site.
